content: happy holidays the crochet stitchmas tree decoration is designed to decorate your home and add a touch of woolly cheer for christmas as an added bonus it can hold your collection of stitch markers like tiny baubles the free instructions for this pattern also come with a video tutorial to walk you through all the steps of making your very own stitchmas tree it s hard to stop at just 1 so have fun crocheting a collection of trees from this easy diy pattern in different sizes with all sorts of yarn from your stash
